Welcome to Helper Collections page!¶

Here is all the necessary documentation for the project:¶

Arrays:¶

Represent low-level arrays.

class modules.helper_collections.arrays.Array(size: int)¶

Represent a c array.

clear(value: Any)¶

Fill the array with value.

class modules.helper_collections.arrays.Array2D(num_rows: int, num_cols: int)¶

Create a 2D Array

clear(value: Any)¶

Set every element of the array to value.

num_cols() → int¶

Return the number of the cols

num_rows() → int¶

Return the number of the rows.

class modules.helper_collections.arrays.DynamicArray¶

A dynamic array class akin to a simplified Python list.

append(obj: Any)¶

Add object to end of the array.

insert(k: int, value: Any)¶

Insert value at index k, shifting subsequent values rightward.

remove(value: Any)¶

Remove first occurrence of value(or raise ValueError).

Node:¶

Represent a node.

class modules.helper_collections.node.Node(data: Any, next_n: Optional[modules.helper_collections.node.Node] = None)¶

Nodes for singly linked structures.

LListQueue:¶

Implementation of the MyStack ADT using a singly linked list.

class modules.helper_collections.llistqueue.Queue¶

Represent a queue using a singly linked list.

isEmpty() → bool¶

Return True if the queue is empty and False otherwise.

peek() → Any¶

Return the first item in the queue.

pop() → Any¶

Remove and return the first item.

push(item: Any)¶

Push the item in the rear of the queue.

Parameters

item – item to push
